preqs: Students must have passed BTG1200 or BTW1200 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTC3150, BTF3931, BTG3221}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTG1200, BTW1200} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 20, 41, 50}
Unit was previously coded {32511, BTG2221%, BTW2221%, BTW3221%, GBU2204%, TBG2221%}

description: This unit provides an introduction to Australian income tax law and practice. Topics include: Australian tax jurisdictional issues, assessable income from personal exertion, property and business, capital gains tax and fringe benefits tax, exempt income, deductions, both general and specific, GST, individual offsets.
